curam.util.connectors.axis2

Class CuramMessageReceiver

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.axis2.engine.MessageReceiver
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CuramXmlDocMessageReceiver

    public class CuramMessageReceiver
extends org.apache.axis2.rpc.receivers.ejb.EJBMessageReceiver
    An in-out message receiver to authenticate and connect to a Curam facade.

      • getAxis2Credentials

        public java.util.Properties getAxis2Credentials(org.apache.axis2.context.MessageContext messageContextIn)
        Obtains the web service credentials for Axis2, which come from either the Axis2 services.xml deployment descriptor or Curam custom SOAP header (depending on build and/or descriptor settings; see the Curam documentation for more details). Override this method if you require alternate credential processing; default Curam credential processing can still be obtained via an override by calling MessageUtil.getCredentials(org.apache.axis2.context.MessageContext).
        Parameters:
        messageContextIn - Input MessageContext.
        Returns:
        properties object containing credentials.

      • getProviderURL

        public java.lang.String getProviderURL()
        Gets the provider URL based on the type of application server in use. Override this method to provide a different provider URL when not specified in services.xml.
        Returns:
        A string containing the provider URL.

      • getContextFactoryName

        public java.lang.String getContextFactoryName()
        Gets the name of the context factory class based on the type of application server in use. Override this method to provide a different context factory when not specified in services.xml.
        Returns:
        the name of the context factory.
